content.description: Climb this little guy for a quickie ride on a surprisingly fun V0. Sit start on obvious holds then move to lip and jugs above. Setup for a high step and finish.
content.location: Off by itself ten feet right of the Homefries boulder.

content.description: Great moves on positive holds. Start on side-pull and stand up to large horizontal then move to nice finger jam in crack and crank up onto better holds above. Finish on easy slab.
content.protection: Bouldering Pad: Good landing but dont miss the pad or you could take a tumble.
content.location: Left side (downhill side) of Homefries boulder just left of blunt arête.

content.description: Homefries is a great warm-up problem but hardly the give-me V0 you might expect.  Stand start and climb right side of steep slab face to jug and right exit.
content.protection: Bouldering Pad: Nice landing, one pad will do.
content.location: Large boulder on Right as you enter the Colflesh area. Same start as Ham (V0) and Bacon (V0). Right side of face.

content.description: Short problem on dirty face. Move up on good edges to top, mantel and finish.
content.protection: Bouldering pad: Landing is sloped so two pads are preferable.
content.location: Small boulder just right of Colflesh boulder. Problem starts beside fallen tree.

content.description: Another great warm-up between Homefries (V0) and Bacon (V0). Stand start and climb center of steep slab face straight up to top.
content.protection: Bouldering Pad: One pad, flat landing.
content.location: Large boulder on Right as you enter the Colflesh area. Same start as Homefires (V0) and Bacon (V0). Center line up face.

content.description: Gird your loins for this one! A fall at the top is definitely a bad idea.  Start on easy holds to fun mantel then reach for sloppy rail high above. Man up (or woman up) and smear blank face to reach jug at top.
content.protection: Bouldering pad: Bring a pad but there really is no way to protect the top so climb strong! And maybe, only do this problem once just to say you did it.
content.location: Left around the backside of the Homefries boulder (boulder on right when entering area).

content.description: Shares a start with Homefries (V0) and Ham (V0) - all good warm-ups. Stand start and climb left side of steep slabby face to good holds and left exit.
content.location: Large boulder on Right as you enter the Colflesh area. Same start as Homefires (V0) and Ham (V0). Left line up face.
